meanings.sent1: Autodidacts enjoy learning new things independently.
meanings.sent2: Many autodidacts excel in various fields without traditional schooling.
meanings.sent3: The autodidact proudly displayed their self-taught skills at the talent show.
meanings.sent4: Her journey from novice to autodidact was like a caterpillar transforming into a butterfly.
meanings.sent5: The library was a sanctuary for autodidacts seeking knowledge.

meanings.definition: People who learn on their own without formal instruction.
meanings.sent1: Some autodidacts prefer to explore subjects independently.
meanings.sent2: Autodidacts often rely on books and online resources for self-education.
meanings.sent3: The group of autodidacts formed a study club to share their discoveries.
meanings.sent4: In a world of teachers, she stood out as an autodidact, forging her path.
meanings.sent5: The internet has opened up endless possibilities for autodidacts to expand their knowledge.
